name: Spring (The Code Anvil)
description: This game works best in fullscreen mode, (blue button in the bottom right.) Spring is a fast moving, 2.5D platformer that o intended for speed running. This project is a submission into the Great Spring Game Jam and the theme was "Spring". The time for the game jam was 20 days, but I only used a little over half of them. NOTE: This game was made for a game jam and likely has many bugs in it.
